It increase bone density bone strength help prevent fracture use treat osteoporosis people high risk bone fracture . The purpose study compare effect teriparatide effect placebo pelvic fracture heal . This study last 16 week . Participants randomly assign receive either teriparatide placebo duration study . Participants also give calcium vitamin D supplement take daily throughout study . At 4-week interval , participant undergo functional evaluation include instrumented sit-to-stand test , timed-up-and-go , gait velocity test . Participants also undergo DXA scan upon enrollment ; undergo CT evaluation upon enrollment 16 week post-fracture ; complete specific pain , self-perceived function , mental status , depression scale throughout study .
